notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The work/publication is supported by the EFOP-3.6.1-16-2016-00022 project and the instrumental background was provided by the GINOP-2.3.3-15-2016-00021 and GINOP-2.3.3-15-2016-00004 projects. The projects were co-financed by the European Union and the European Regional Development Fund. Furthermore, this paper was also supported by the János Bolyai Research Scholarship of the Hungarian Academy of Sciences (Miklós Nagy).
